Hmm... good idea Paul. I should write a blog post about that.
The really short answer is: I feel CamanJS is much easier to use, much easier to write plugins for (making it very extensible), and much more flexible.
Those projects do provide similar functionality, but I feel CamanJS does it in a better, more comprehensive, way.
